definition: (of a mine or oil well) drilled speculatively in an area not known to be productive, any small or medium-sized cat resembling the domestic cat and living in the wild
details:
adjective
- (of a mine or oil well) drilled speculatively in an area not known to be productive
= example: (of a mine or oil well) drilled speculatively in an area not known to be productive
- without official authorization
= synonyms: unofficially
- outside the bounds of legitimate or ethical business practices
= example: outside the bounds of legitimate or ethical business practices
noun
- any small or medium-sized cat resembling the domestic cat and living in the wild
- an exploratory oil well drilled in land not known to be an oil field
= synonyms: wildcat well
- a cruelly rapacious person
= synonyms: beast
